name: joynr-build
description: Web-based communication framework for applications wanting to interact with other applications, no matter whether they're deployed on consumer devices, vehicles, or backend infrastructure

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json src/main/js/node_modules src/main/js/package-lock.json out .output src/main/js/joynr/buildSignature.ts src/main/js/etc ../../node_modules ../../package-lock.json
scripts.format:install: npm i prettier@1.17.1 --no-save && npm run format
scripts.test: npm run ts:test:ci && npm run ts:test:sit
scripts.build:fast: npm run build:install && npm run build:skip && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:fast && npm run build:doc
scripts.build:install: npm --prefix src/main/js i && npm --prefix ../.. i && npm i
scripts.build:skip: npm run build:install && npm run sig && npm run lint && npm run fixRequire && npm run ts:package
scripts.ts:package: npm run ts:compile:dts && cp src/main/js/package.json .output/src/main/js && cp package.json .output && npm --prefix .output i && npm --prefix .output/src/main/js i && cp -r  src/main/js/META-INF/ .output/src/main/js
